text:
Did @BorisJohnson misspeak when he said greed & capitalism were behind #UK's #COVID19 #vaccine rollout? Can greed play a positive role for innovation? 

We bring you two opposing views in this excerpt of my conversation: @globaljusticeuk's @nickdearden75 & @iealondon's @cjsnowdon https://t.co/lgDju23Pma
